amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for the Bureau of Economic Analysis by $4.3 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 74 printed in the Congressional Record to increase the amount for Economic Statistical Analysis in the Commerce Department by $4.4 million and decreasing funds in the State Department Mutual Eduacational and Cultural Exchange account by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Smith (MI) amendment (A024) Failed by voice vote.
